page.title: 16HOUSES IN STEVENAGE
page.content: In this part of Stevenage there are lots of different houses. Fairview Road was built from about 1900. Most of the houses in the road are different from each other they are all detatched or semi-detatched. Brixham Close is part of the New Town development called{Symonds Green.}All the roads are named after seaside towns. The houses in this neighbourhood are all brick built terraced houses to a few basic designs. This means there are many houses of the same design in each road. In Brixham Close nearly all the houses are the same except for the flats and a couple of houses that have 4 bedrooms. The new houses usually have smaller rooms than the older ones and they have smaller gardens. Most of the children in our school live in the new houses.
